actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Mendocino National Forest, Calif., as the "Snow Mountain Wilderness" for inclusion in the national wilderness preservation system.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Mendocino National Forest, California, as the "Snow Mountain Wilderness" for inclusion in the national wilderness preservation system.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Mendocino National Forest, Calif., as the "Snow Mountain Wilderness" for inclusion in the national wilderness preservation system.
